content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-15.0, -49.0) which is actively smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (41.5, -80.5) for transferring items into the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Transfer System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0) extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (40.5, -82.5) collecting coal from the mining drill.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -83.5) for additional storage.
- Burner Inserter at position (54.5, -83.5) transferring items from the chest at position (56.5, -83.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (56.5, -83.5) receiving items from the inserter.

### Belt Transport System
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with inputs and outputs connecting various positions for item transport.
- Belts connecting positions (50.5, -86.5) to (48.5, -86.5) and (49.5, -86.5) to (47.5, -86.5), facilitating coal transportation.
- Additional belts at positions (43.5, -84.5) to (45.5, -84.5) and (45.5, -85.5) to (47.5, -85.5), and (52.5, -83.5) to (52.5, -85.5) for item movement.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Chest Overcapacity Warning
- The chest at position (40.5, -82.5) is full. Regularly empty the chest to ensure continuous mining operations.
